## üéµ Highlighted Shows

### **Cate Le Bon** with Frances Chang
- **Date:** Thursday, January 15, 2026
- **Venue:** The Sinclair (Cambridge)
- **Doors:** 7:00 PM | 18 & Over
- **Why you'll like it:** Welsh experimental/art rock artist with a unique, avant-garde sound that blends David Bowie, Nico, and Laurie Anderson influences. Her new album *Michelangelo Dying* features iridescent arrangements with saxophones and guitars pushed through pedals. This is exactly your kind of experimental indie.
- **Link:** https://www.sinclaircambridge.com/events/detail/1006283

### **Bishop Allen & Mates of State**
- **Date:** Tuesday, January 14, 2026  
- **Venue:** The Sinclair (Cambridge)
- **Why you'll like it:** Classic indie rock double bill. Bishop Allen is a beloved Cambridge indie band, and Mates of State brings experimental keyboard-driven indie pop.
- **Link:** https://www.sinclaircambridge.com/events/detail/1160316

### **Glare** with All Under Heaven, Holder, Dream Fatigue
- **Date:** Sunday, January 18, 2026
- **Venue:** The Sinclair (Cambridge)
- **Doors:** 6:30 PM | All Ages
- **Why you'll like it:** Experimental/noise rock lineup - perfect for your experimental music interests.
- **Link:** https://www.sinclaircambridge.com/events/detail/1214457

### **NEC Jazz Composers' Workshop Orchestra: Music of Anthony Braxton**
- **Date:** Thursday, February 12, 2026
- **Venue:** Jordan Hall (NEC)
- **Time:** 7:30 PM
- **Why you'll like it:** Anthony Braxton is a legendary experimental jazz composer and multi-instrumentalist. His large ensemble work performed by NEC students is a rare opportunity to experience avant-garde contemporary music.
- **Link:** https://www.necmusic.edu/events

### The Lilypad (Inman Square)
**You live right here!** 

- **Status:** No new special events currently listed beyond their regular weekly programming. The Dave Rempis experimental jazz show (Jan 9) has passed.
- **Regular Weekly Programming:**
  - **Tuesday:** Experimental/new music nights **(Check these for your interests!)**
  - **Wednesday:** Gill Aharon Trio and singer-songwriter nights
  - **Monday:** Jazz sessions
  - **Weekends:** Various bookings and special shows
- **Action:** Check their website frequently for special bookings: https://www.lilypadinman.com/
- **Note:** The Lilypad sometimes announces shows last-minute. Since you live right there, checking in person or stopping by on Tuesday experimental nights could reveal unlisted gems.
